channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: The Moment of Proof
channel.desc: A blood-spattered hammer is the key to charging the police's prime suspect with a vicious murder. Police believe the man they have in custody is the killer, but with only circumstantial evidence, they need a breakthrough, Fortunately, they receive a mysterious call from the man providing their suspect's alibi. Also today, a drug-dealing gang is brought to its knees when one detective focuses on how the product is packaged to catch the men at the top.
